entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with wet snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Periods of wet snow inland overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
